dashboardAdmin.title: Statistical Analysis System
dashboardAdmin.firstText: Advanced system built with CodeIgniter 4 (PHP) framework in Admin style, featuring Dashboard, Profile, Login, Statistical Charts, Database and more. Base model for multiple types of statistical and analytical systems.

gestorUsuario.secondText: Designed with a local database generated in LOG or TXT with double encryption for maximum protection. Developed in Java, NetBeans, JDK, JFrame

Integrated with Google Auth for secure login. Ability to create new categories, items and inventories for personalized and complete management.

structureImplementation.description: Design of complex data structures and algorithms such as AVL Trees (Adelson-Velskii-Landis), Binary Decision Trees (BDT), labeled graphs, Design and implementation of open and closed Hash.

videojuegos.title: It's not just playing
videojuegos.intro: Besides enjoying playing video games, I greatly admire their art, design, music and programming logic. I'm very curious about 'How did they achieve that?' and I research, read and learn about it. I look for the developers, the company and the challenges they had to overcome to achieve the final goal.
videojuegos.controlDescription: In video game programming you have to take into account the same aspects as in cinema or even more. If we think of a story and then want to turn it into a game, we have to consider the environment, its style, its art, even its natural laws like 'will the physics be the same as ours or do they change?' from its gravity to the format of its flora and fauna.
videojuegos.detailDescription: Details like whether the main character will have companions or if they can climb walls greatly alter the gameplay of the game, which means that every detail has to be foreseen or its impact on the final product analyzed.
videojuegos.transmitDescription: Video games have become very popular not only for being fun but for the stories they tell or what they transmit. The sensations of winning, competing, cooperation, and the sensations they can transmit (fear, laughter, adrenaline) are all the work of the director and development team of the game. What I like most about video game development is being able to transmit emotions or sensations to the end user.

impresion3d.title: 3D Printing as entrepreneurship
impresion3d.intro: Looking for something that would allow me to get away from the computer, have fun and generate income, I found a section that caught my attention, 3D printing.
impresion3d.startDescription: First I focused on making office articles, a niche that was not exploited in my region, then I made articles for the home, then with figures and toys, and finally with personalized articles. I did all this in my free time, and sold it through networks until I formalized the entrepreneurship.
impresion3d.websiteDescription: Friends, family and acquaintances were my first clients until I could reach more people through social networks. After some time I decided to create a website to show my products and for people to generate a shopping cart and place orders with shipments throughout the country (Argentina).
impresion3d.experiencesDescription: It's my first entrepreneurship, I learned a lot about management, sales, marketing, customer service and social media management. I have a lot of fun and it clears me from programming which is my main activity.

vidaSocial.title: IT professionals and social life
vidaSocial.intro: For a long time there has been a stereotype of the computer scientist who doesn't leave home, who remains locked in his computer, without social activities or having many friendships. Over time this is changing and the computer scientist becomes a more sociable being. But that stereotype is not my style, I am very sociable.
vidaSocial.likeTitle: What do I like to do?
vidaSocial.likeDescription: I really enjoy getting together with friends to eat, dance, walk, go to the river, etc. I also like to enjoy a coffee alone and time for myself or browse malls, shopping centers, clothing or technology stores even if I don't buy anything.
vidaSocial.personalityDescription: I am quite sociable and empathetic with people, that doesn't mean I'm the best but it's true that being sociable opens doors and I usually handle personal relationships very well which makes it easier for me to deal with people in offices, university and friendships.
